intro.label: Config file info
intro.body:
Config can also be changed by manually altering config file.
Config file location:
- [WoT game directory]/mods/configs/AchievementNotification/config.json
intro.note: If you want to generate default config file, delete it and launch a game again
common-settings.label: Common settings
common-settings.first-display-time.label: First display time
common-settings.first-display-time.body:
Controls how long should achievement be displayed.
For multiple achievements at once, this time applies only to first achievement in group.
The other achievements in group uses "Consecutive display time" parameter.
common-settings.consecutive-display-time: If multiple achievements occurred at once, this parameter controls
how long should consecutive achievements in group (after first one) be displayed.
achievements-settings.label: Achievements settings
display-achievement.body: If checked, display this achievement during battle.
